alert.note: Alert for Choctaw; Clarke (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 14 at 5:19PM CDT until June 14 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Choctaw County in southwestern Alabama... Northwestern Clarke County in southwestern Alabama... * Until 545 PM CDT. * At 518 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles southeast of Toxey, or 14 miles south of Butler, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Coffeeville, Gilbertown and Toxey. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
